titles.title: Authorship and Contribution in the Age of AI: Notes on the Current Debate

abstract.p: A reflection on the concept of authorship in academic research. International criteria (ICMJE, CRediT), common conflicts and main ethical guidelines in times of AI (artificial intelligence) to support a fair recognition of scholarly contributions are discussed.
